content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max Müller, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. How much were you thinking of paying per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To start the negotiation, I would like to offer 650 euros per month. This is a fair price because the apartment is unfurnished and in the city center. I am, however, open to hear your counter-offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 650 euros per month is a very generous offer, Max Müller. However, I must consider the location and the amenities nearby. The apartment is in the heart of München, close to all the essential facilities. It's also a brand new construction, which adds value. Could you possibly increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering your points, I would like to counter with 700 euros per month. This price reflects the location, amenities, and new construction of the apartment. I believe this is a fair price given all the factors.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 700 euros per month is certainly more in line with the value of the apartment, Max Müller. The location is prime, and the new construction offers modern comforts. However, I am looking for a tenant who appreciates the true worth of this property. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. As a student, I have to consider my budget carefully. However, given the location and new construction, I am willing to meet you halfway. I can offer 775 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your offer of 775 euros per month shows that you are a serious tenant who values the location and quality of the apartment. This is indeed a more competitive offer. Would you be willing to go just a bit higher to reflect the premium nature of this property?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a student, I must consider my budget carefully. I believe 775 euros per month is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. However, I am willing to increase my offer slightly to show my appreciation for the location and quality of the apartment. I can offer 800 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your willingness to increase your offer demonstrates your understanding of the apartment's value. The 800 euros per month offer is indeed closer to my expectations, considering the prime location and the fact that it's a brand new construction. Is this your final offer, or are you open to discussing a slightly higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a responsible student, I have to consider my budget carefully. However, given the location and new construction, I am willing to increase my offer to 825 euros per month. This is my final offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your offer of 825 euros per month reflects a good understanding of the apartment's worth. The location and new construction certainly add to the value. Would you be willing to go just a bit higher, say 850 euros per month, to seal the deal? This would be a fair price for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. As a student, I have to consider my budget carefully. However, given the location and new construction, I am willing to meet you halfway. I can offer 837.50 euros per month, which is the average of our proposed prices.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, your offer of 837.50 euros per month is a very thoughtful gesture. It shows that you are a reasonable person who is willing to compromise. While this is a fair price, I must emphasize that the apartment's location and new construction truly justify a higher rental value. Would you be willing to reconsider and offer 850 euros per month? This would be the highest price I would consider for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 euros per month!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
